cause.description:
French Bulldog Rescue Network (FBRN) exists solely to address the growing problem of homeless French bulldogs. We are grateful to everyone who donates time, effort and money to our cause.
Visit the FBRN website at: www.frenchbulldogrescue.org
1. Save the lives of as many Frenchies as possible.
cause.mission: to rescue, rehabilitate and rehome Frenchies in need.
cause.name: French Bulldog Rescue Network
